teachingHistory.description: Designed and led a comprehensive web development bootcamp covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database technologies. Responsible for curriculum development, lectures, hands-on workshops, and student mentorship.
Taught undergraduate courses in game design principles, level design, and game development using Unity.  Conducted lectures, project reviews, and provided individual student guidance.
Provided one-on-one tutoring in programming fundamentals, Python, and Java to high school and college students. Assisted with homework, exam preparation, and project guidance.
Facilitated introductory JavaScript workshops for adults looking to learn basic web development skills. Covered fundamental concepts, DOM manipulation, and basic scripting.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Specialized in Software Engineering and Game Development. GPA: 3.9/4.0. Relevant coursework included: Advanced Algorithms, 3D Graphics, Game Engine Architecture, Web Application Development.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.details: Focused on web technologies and database management. Graduated with Honors.
